Detailed Description

A class representing a quaternion rotation @notes See http://www.opengl-tutorial.org/intermediate-tutorials/tutorial-17-quaternions/.

Member Function Documentation

static

Obtain a quaternion from a direction and up vector.

This is essentially a "lookAt" rotation

◆ fromEulerAngles()

Quaternion rev::Quaternion::fromEulerAngles ( const EulerAngles &  eulerAngles)
static

Obtain a quaternion from a set of Euler Angles.

Creates a quaternion that corresponds to a rotation of eulerAngles. eulerAngles.z() radians around the z axis, eulerAngles.x() radians around the x axis, and eulerAngles.y() radians around the y axis (in that order).

◆ getAxisAndAngle()

void rev::Quaternion::getAxisAndAngle ( Vector3 &  axis,
real_g &  angle 
) const

Get rotation axis and angle about that axis corresponding to this quaternion.

Returned angle is in radians

◆ Nlerp()

Quaternion rev::Quaternion::Nlerp ( const Quaternion &  q1,
const Quaternion &  q2,
real_g  t 
)
static

Linearly interpolates between two quaternions, normalized lerp.

Interpolates along the shortest linear path between the rotational positions q1 and q2. The value t should be between 0 and 1, indicating the distance to travel between q1 and q2. The result will be normalized().

◆ rotationTo()

Quaternion rev::Quaternion::rotationTo ( const Vector3 &  from,
const Vector3 &  to 
)
static

Rotate from the "from" vector to the "to" vector.

Returns the shortest arc quaternion to rotate from the direction described by the vector "from" to the direction described by the vector "to".

◆ Slerp()

Quaternion rev::Quaternion::Slerp ( const Quaternion &  q1,
const Quaternion &  q2,
real_g  t 
)
static

Spherically interpolates between two quaternions.

Interpolates along the shortest spherical path between the rotational positions q1 and q2. The value t should be between 0 and 1, indicating the distance to travel between q1 and q2.

◆ toAngularVelocity()

void rev::Quaternion::toAngularVelocity ( Vector3 &  vel) const

Obtain a set of Euler Angles corresponding to this quaternion.

Convert to an "angular velocity" See: https://forum.unity.com/threads/average-quaternions.86898/

◆ toVector4()

Vector4 rev::Quaternion::toVector4 ( ) const

Obtain euler angles corresponding to a quaternion.

Calculates roll, pitch, yaw Euler angles (in radians) corresponding to this Quaternion Convert the quaternion to a vector
